import React, { useState, Component } from "react"; import { Form, Row, Col, Grid, Button, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./profile.css"; class Profile extends Component { state = { img: this.props.img, name: this.props.name, Dob: this.props.Dob, country: this.props.country, city: this.props.city, address: this.props.address, }; render() { return (

Profile

Welcome, this is your profile page.

Name: {this.state.name}

Date of birth: {this.state.Dob}

Country: {this.state.country}

City: {this.state.city}

Address: {this.state.address}

); } } export default Profile;
